title: Haunted Zyra can't use mastery emote when dead
body:
I have level 7 mastery on Zyra and like to sometimes spam it, but I am unable to show off my skill when  I'm dead! It works fine on the normal skin, but I haven't been able to try it on Wildfire/SKT skins.

Edit: Sorry forgot to tag as [GAMEPLAY]-- don't think I can edit the title.

replies.body: Hi hi!  Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue, and it's on our radar. :)
